name.description: The component name for the table component

templateBasePath.description: The base path to search for included templates

skipTests.description: When true, does not create "spec.ts" test files for the new component.

overwrite.description: Whether existing files and properties should be overwritten

skipTsFiles.description: Skip the creation or update of typescript files

project.description: The name of the project where the table component should be generated.

openApiModule.description: The project name for the OpenApi RemoteMethods and Directives
